text:
Beverley Owen (born Beverley Ogg; May 13, 1937February 21, 2019) was an American actress. She was best known as the original role of Marilyn Munster during the first season of "The Munsters". Owen was born in Ottumwa, Iowa.
Owen died on February 21, 2019 in Burlington, Vermont from ovarian cancer, aged 81.
